property.title: Upgraded | 1 Br | Furnished | Vacant
property.title_l2: 位于绿意盎然街区，阿尔阿塔，阿尔阿塔4号 1 卧室的公寓 1400000 AED - 8583654
property.title_l3: Квартира в Гринс，Ал Арта，Аль-Арта 4, 1 спальня, 1400000 AED - 8583654
property.description:
Hamptons International is pleased to present to the market this beautifully renovated and furnished one bedroom apartment, located in Al Arta, in the beautiful community of the Greens. 
The unit is tastefully renovated throughout, equipped with all furnishings and decor which demand a high ROI due to its AirBNB fit living. The apartment is offered for sale vacant on transfer.  

Property features:

- 1 bedroom
- Fully Furnished
- Modern renovation
- Kitchen with built in appliances 
- Bathroom with a walk-in shower
- Built in wardrobes
- Vacant on Transfer
- Covered Parking
- Shared Pool and Gym
- Walking distance to supermarket, shops, etc

Call Elena Balan on [redacted phone number] or email at [redacted email address] for further details. 

This property is within walking distance to Regent International School, bus station, community center and not far from the metro station with easy access to Sheikh Zayed Road & Hessa Road. Greens presents a range of amenities including a well-equipped gymnasium, a relaxing pool deck with a refreshing pool, and a vibrant children's play area. 

Hamptons UAE
Emaar Business Park, bldg no 3,
[redacted phone number]
[redacted phone number]
www. hamptons. ae
